name: A Grey Tiled Hallway
description:
You are in a grey tiled hallway leading north and south.  Dim balls
of energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the
way.  A feeling of peace and balance comes over you.
   Large, grey metal double doors can be seen to the south.

exits.keywords: door grey~ 1 -1 2653 S #2653 The Antechamber~    You are in the antechamber of the Master Magician of the Grey Light. A feeling of strong magic floats in the air about you, almost as if you could taste the power held within these walls.    Once your eyes adjust to the semi-light, you can make out a larger room to the south.
